attributes.action: Pass the Attenborough act. The banning of the use of fossil fuels.
attributes.additional_details: There is no other way in which a change to this scale can be carried out. It has to be a national decision with the full power of the government.
attributes.background: Whilst there is already so much being done, more can be done and all it takes is a country with power and influence over the world. England can do this and whilst in the current economic climate it is not easy, there can still be a start towards a change like this.

rejection.details:
We understand you want fossil fuels to be banned, but it is not clear whether you want this ban to apply to the production of fossil fuels in the UK, to products which are manufactured using fossil fuels, or to vehicles and other machinery which are powered by fossil fuels. 

You may be interested to know that the Government has recently held a consultation on proposals to end the sale of all petrol, diesel and hybrid cars and vans by 2035 at the latest. The results of the consultation will be published in due course: https://www.gov.uk/government/consultations/consulting-on-ending-the-sale-of-new-petrol-diesel-and-hybrid-cars-and-vans.
